column6:
"CHASING HELLFIRE" PART 2 (OF 3),2004,12
The X-Men, hot on the trail of Sage, find themselves in the sewers of Paris. But who's really hunting whom?
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller (cover):Greg Land | penciller:Andy Park | colorist:Justin Ponsor | inker:Jonathan Sibal | letterer:Rus Wooton
